article: When he was driving home one evening on a country road,he saw an old lady on the side of the road.He _ in front of her ear and got out.Even with the _ on his face,she Was worried.He looked poor and hungry.He knew _ she felt.He said,"I am here to help you,madam.Why don't you wait in the ear where it's warm? By the way ,my name is Joe." She had a _ tire.Joe crawled under the ear,changed the tire.But he got _ and his hands hurt.She could not thank him _ and asked him how much she _ him.He told her that if she really wanted to _ him back,the next time she saw, someone who needed help,she could give that person the _ they needed. She drove off.A few miles down the road the lady saw a small _ .She went in. The waitress had a sweet smile,and was nearly eight months _ .The old lady _ how someone like her who seemed poor could be so kind to a _ .Then she remembered Joe.After the lady finished her meal.the waitress went to get her _ from a hundred--dollar bill.But she stepped right out the door. when the waitress came back,she noticed something _ on a napkin ,"I am helping you because someone once helped me.If you really want to pay me back.here's what you do--Do not let the _ of love end with you." That night when she got home,she was thinking about the money and what the lady had written. She and her husband needed money with the baby _ .next month.She knew how worried her bus band was and as he lay _ next to her,she whispered,"Everything's going to be all right,I love you,Joe."
